target: Fatty Acid Metabolism Pathway in IBD
description: An increased abundance of Bifidobacterium is associated with higher expression of genes involved in fatty acid metabolism.
Bacteroides correlates with increased metallothionein signaling.
A transcriptional network dominated by immunoregulatory genes is associated with Lachnoclostridium bacteria in non-stenotic tissue.

target: Fatty Acid Metabolism Pathway in IBD
description: A transcriptional network dominated by fatty acid metabolism genes is linked to Ruminococcaceae in patients using TNF-α-antagonists.
